topic.title: Story List
topic.p: Managing your "story list" or "product backlog" in Mingle is easy. Mingle allows you to model your business vision (ideas and features) in a way that makes sense to you. You can customize different levels of granularity, e.g. epics, features, stories, tasks, etc.
Once you determine how you want to break down your features and assuming you know how to filter your cards, you will have several different view options to see your story list:

bullets.item: tree view (if you use card trees)
hierarchy view (if you use card trees)

topic.p: You can toggle back and forth between the view options based on what you need to do.

bullets.item: Create either a team favorite or a my favorite to easily navigate to your story list.
Using the grid view, you can also use the group by, sort by and color by actions to help you see your story list from different perspectives and rank the cards in your story list.
Using the tree view allows you to easily drag and drop cards within your story list.
